Meteoric Origins

Lucky Ape was concieved on a warm summer night under a meteror peppered sky. From the home office in Kitsilano we originally incorporated in 2010 with a goal of providing small boutique agencies some runway to expand & larger agencies some runway before bringing on fulltime resources.

Today our accomplishments include a full range of software solution including data management, experience design, security auditing & web software.

After more than a decade of developing Drupal, Wordpress and custom LAMP stack application, today the MEAN stack gets deployed given the choice.

If there is a secret sauce to LA's long record of delivery satisfying results its the informed insight for almost 20 years experience.
